typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Constrained as string,
		CostRate as string,
		ExtraArea as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadUpdateTeams
ReadUpdateTeams select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name,
		Constrained,
		CostRate,
		ExtraArea),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:Team;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'false') ~> ModelDefinition
source(output(
		Team as string,
		Index as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadMapCatKeyLabels
ReadMapCatKeyLabels aggregate(groupBy(Team),
	CatKeyLabels = toString(keyValues(collect(toString(Index)), collect(toString(Value))))) ~> AggregateMapCatKeyLabelsKeyIndex
AggregateMapCatKeyLabelsKeyIndex derive(CatKeyLabels = replace(replace(replace(CatKeyLabels, '"{', '{'), '}"', '}'), '\\', '')) ~> CatKeyLabelsCleaning
ModelDefinition, CatKeyLabelsCleaning join({$id} == Team,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto') ~> CatKeyLabelsUnion
CatKeyLabelsUnion select(mapColumn(
		{$id},
		{Constrained},
		{CostRate},
		{ExtraArea},
		{$metadata.$model},
		{$entityDelete},
		CatKeyLabels),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CatKeyLabelsSelect
source(output(
		Team as string,
		Year as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadMapAvailableQuantityByYear
ReadMapAvailableQuantityByYear aggregate(groupBy(Team),
	AvailableQuantityByYear = toString(keyValues(collect(toString(Year)), collect(toFloat(Value))))) ~> AggregateMapAvailableQuantityByYearKeyYear
AggregateMapAvailableQuantityByYearKeyYear derive(AvailableQuantityByYear = replace(replace(replace(AvailableQuantityByYear, '"{', '{'), '}"', '}'), '\\', '')) ~> AvailableQuantityByYearCleaning
CatKeyLabelsSelect, AvailableQuantityByYearCleaning join({$id} == Team,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto') ~> AvailableQuantityByYearUnion
AvailableQuantityByYearUnion select(mapColumn(
		{$id},
		{Constrained},
		{CostRate},
		{ExtraArea},
		{$metadata.$model},
		{$entityDelete},
		{CatKeyLabels},
		AvailableQuantityByYear),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AvailableQuantityByYearSelect
source(output(
		Team as string,
		Year as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadMapMinimalQuantityLevelByYear
ReadMapMinimalQuantityLevelByYear aggregate(groupBy(Team),
	MinimalQuantityLevelByYear = toString(keyValues(collect(toString(Year)), collect(toFloat(Value))))) ~> AggregateMapMinimalQuantityLevelByYearKeyYear
AggregateMapMinimalQuantityLevelByYearKeyYear derive(MinimalQuantityLevelByYear = replace(replace(replace(MinimalQuantityLevelByYear, '"{', '{'), '}"', '}'), '\\', '')) ~> MinimalQuantityLevelByYearCleaning
AvailableQuantityByYearSelect, MinimalQuantityLevelByYearCleaning join({$id} == Team,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto') ~> MinimalQuantityLevelByYearUnion
MinimalQuantityLevelByYearUnion select(mapColumn(
		{$id},
		{Constrained},
		{CostRate},
		{ExtraArea},
		{$metadata.$model},
		{$entityDelete},
		{CatKeyLabels},
		{AvailableQuantityByYear},
		MinimalQuantityLevelByYear),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MinimalQuantityLevelByYearSelect
MinimalQuantityLevelByYearSelect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_Teams.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
